meanings.definition: The activity or sport of moving rapidly through an urban environment, typically involving running, jumping, and climbing.
meanings.sent1: My friend enjoys watching parkours in the city park.
meanings.sent2: The parkours competition showcased incredible agility and strength.
meanings.sent3: The parkours event in the park was both thrilling and impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were like a graceful parkours dancer in the urban jungle.
meanings.sent5: The parkours athletes made the cityscape their playground.

meanings.definition: A course or route used for practicing or performing parkour movements.
meanings.sent1: The parkours set up in the gym helped improve my skills.
meanings.sent2: The parkours layout in the park was challenging yet exciting.
meanings.sent3: The parkours course was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Navigating the parkours felt like conquering a mini obstacle course.
meanings.sent5: The parkours path was a fun challenge for all ages.
